sentences.en: A waxy cloud or haze appears in the liquid.
sentences.cn: 在液体中出现蜡点或混浊.

sentences.en: And some minutely crystalline varieties, such as flint, may be opaque and of a waxy luster.
sentences.cn: 某些细小的结晶变种, 如燧石, 可能是不透明的,并具有腊样的光泽.

sentences.en: And the waxy oil keeps ears from getting to too dry.
sentences.cn: 耳垢分泌的油脂保护耳朵不至过干.

sentences.en: And the waxy oil keeps ears from getting too dry.
sentences.cn: 同时耳蜡也可以避免耳朵过于干燥.

sentences.en: Certain aphids seem to prefer waxy leaves, whereas other species are repelled by them.
sentences.cn: 有些蚜虫,看来喜欢有蜡质的叶片, 而这种叶片对另一些蚜虫却有拒避作用.

sentences.en: Frozen tissue is painless and appears waxy with a possible yellow color.
sentences.cn: 冻伤的组织是不痛的,看起来象黄颜色的蜡一样.

sentences.en: Frozen tissues are painless and appear waxy with a pallid yellow color.
sentences.cn: 冻伤的组织是不痛的,看起来象淡黄颜色的蜡一样.

sentences.en: Improvement and utilization of waxy wheat were also discussed.
sentences.cn: 还讨论了糯小麦的改良和利用问题.

sentences.en: Inside was a green paste, waxy in lustre, the odour curiously heavy and persistent.
sentences.cn: 里边是一种绿色的软膏, 有蜡质的光泽, 气味浓郁,而且经久不散.

sentences.en: It would even peck my bobbing nib with its waxy red bill.
sentences.cn: 索性用那涂了蜡似的、角质的小红嘴,“嗒嗒”啄着我颤动的笔尖.

sentences.en: Main products soft waxy , Zhinong pure taste and rich nutrition.
sentences.cn: 主品柔糯,汁浓味醇,营养丰富.

sentences.en: Maybe I will lose this waxy British pallor once and for all.
sentences.cn: 也许我就要彻底摆脱像英国人那样蜡一般苍白的脸色了.

sentences.en: The alcohol dissolves their waxy coatings, and kills the pest.
sentences.cn: 酒精可以溶解蜡层最终杀死害虫.

sentences.en: the waxy blossoms of the water lily
sentences.cn: 睡莲那如蜡一般的花朵

sentences.en: They also secrete a waxy, transparent substance called cutin.
sentences.cn: 它们还分泌蜡质的透明物质,称作角质.

sentences.en: Viscoelasticity of waxy crude oil originated from the structure of waxy crystal.
sentences.cn: 含蜡原油粘弹性起因于其内部形成的蜡晶结构.

words.tran_cn: 渐渐变大；变为；给…上蜡（wax的过去分词）
柔软的；蜡色的；像蜡的；苍白的

trans.tran_cn: 像蜡的，蜡色的，苍白的，光滑的
trans.tran_en: like wax, or made of wax
